configure_domain.description:
Configure the following DNS record, along with your subdomain, with your domain provider.

After entering the subdomain and CNAME registration, come back to this page and click "Verify".
Any doubts? Press
configure_domain.note: Verification may take up to 24 hours, depending on your provider. Meanwhile, you can continue working on your Landing Pages.
configure_domain.title: Domain verification

create_domain.title: Create your domain
create_domain.description:
If your Website uses your root domain (for example, www.mysite.com), you must create a subdomain that contains it (for example, promo.mysite.com). We can't show your Landing Pages in the same URL as your Website.
Remember that you can only include numbers, letters and middle hyphen.

error.default: An error has occurred, please try again later.
error.duplicate: This domain has been previously added.
error.invalid: Ouch! The domain name is not valid.
error.required: Ouch! You have to complete all the fields.
error.used_by_other: This domain is being used by another User. Write us at support@fromdoppler.com and we will let you know how to proceed.

error.default: Ouch! Something was wrong when trying to delete domain.
error.form_associated: Ouch! You can't remove this domain because it has published Forms associated.

delete.text: The domain "{{domain}}" will be removed permanently. Are you sure?

status.configuration_error: Ouch! Verified with error. Click on and follow the steps to fix it.
status.verified: Verified. You may start using your domain.

landing_pages_domains.no_domains: You haven't added any domain yet.
landing_pages_domains.subhead: Add domains for those Forms you want to display as Landing Pages.
landing_pages_domains.title: Landing Pages domains

verification_error.description: Check these options to fix it:
verification_error.first_suggest: 1) Verify that your CNAME goes to {{formDopplerPagesDomain}} and check for spelling or typing errors.
verification_error.note:
If you have already verified that there are no problems with the CNAME settings and waited at least 24 hours for your update, write us at support@fromdoppler.com.
Remember to include a screenshot of your host's CNAME Control Panel so we can fix it quickly.
verification_error.second_suggest:
2) Expect some delay from your host to update the CNAME.
If it is set correctly, wait at least 2 hours for it to start working.
verification_error.title: Verified with error
